Exaggerate: The claim made by President Trump exaggerates the idea that the "Russia thing" is a completely made-up story by the Democrats.
Understate: The claim understates the ongoing investigations and the possibility of collusion between members of the Trump team and Russian interference in the election.
Falters at times: The claim falters by ignoring the evidence presented by the Office of the Director of National Intelligence and former FBI Director James Comey regarding Russian interference and the investigation.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to substantiate the assertion that the Russia story is entirely fabricated by the Democrats.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Democrats invented the idea of Russian interference in the election without considering the evidence and investigations that led to the conclusion.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim dismisses the alternative explanation that there may be a connection between the Trump campaign and Russian efforts, as suggested by the investigations.
